nodes.bodyText:
Pardon me, I failed to catch the fixing/improvement about setting  flag rejoinNeeded to true.
The flag rejoinNeeded is read by AbstractCoordinator#rejoinNeededOrPending only and the return value is set to true in this overrided method (ConsumerCoordinator#rejoinNeededOrPending). Hence, setting flag rejoinNeeded to true seems to be a NOP?
It doesn't affect the first time this path is taken. We set the flag to ensure that if join fails,  we retry.
